no_races_left: No more races for this season.
season_not_started: The season is not started yet!
constructors_not_available:
Constructors standings is not available.
Update the app when the season starts.
drivers_not_available:
Drivers standings is not available.
Update the app when the season starts.

infoButton.races_in_timezone: All the race times are in your timezone.
infoButton.quali_desc_switchtile: The countdown shows first the remaning time for the qualifying session and then for the race.

premiumButton.purchase_pending:
Your donation is in progress.
The process can take up to 24 hours. Restart the app periodically to validate your purchase.
premiumButton.already_owned: You already own this item or Google is processing the payment. This can take up to 24 hours. Please don't buy other products while this is in progress.
premiumButton.error_occoured:
Error occoured while parsing the avaible products.
Please restart the app and check your Play Store login.
premiumButton.no_restore: There is no purchase to restore. If you think this is a mistake please contact the developer.
premiumButton.playstore_error: Play Store error. You can't currently buy any support for the app.
premiumButton.thanksMessage: Thanks for donating to Formula Calendar.
